description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on transforming education, knowledge sharing, and fostering inclusive internet communities. His work spans various domains, including ecosystem architecture, decentralization, and regenerative design. yeehaa's blog posts and curated courses reflect his diverse interests, covering topics like internet fragmentation, innovation practices, and sustainable collaboration. He advocates for value pluralism and embracing complexity in digital spaces, drawing inspiration from nature and philosophy to create adaptive, self-renewing systems.
blurb: yeehaa, an ecosystem architect with a PhD, blends tech and philosophy to transform education and foster inclusive digital communities. His work spans ecosystem architecture, decentralization, and regenerative design, advocating for value pluralism and complexity in digital spaces.
